title: I NEED HALPPP PLSSS ANSWERRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR
body: uhh its hard to play league because I have like 11 FPS when my frioends have around 100 FPS, what do we need to upgrade the FPS? do we need a better graphics card? I'm just wondering pls help me lol I would like to play my league with more than 11 FPS, especially in ranked, can anyone reply and help me please?

replies.body: FPS issues can be a result of a few things like hardware, outdated drivers, or even corrupt game files.  I recommend going over our [FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to help tune-up your PC.  Just keep in mind that tuning up doesn't necessarily mean it can exceed the limitations of your PC's power.  I hope it helps!

THANK YOU POROCLES! :D 
I will now goo n the FPS guide that you recommended, than you very much!
Your Da best!
